Title: The Declaration of Independence
Actors: Marc McDermott, Robert Brower, Harry Linson, Miriam Nesbitt
Plot: We see Jefferson writing the declaration with extracts from the famous document and the next morning the argument and final adoption of it by Congress, while John Adams' son, afterward the sixth President of the United States, has stationed himself at the door to listen for the news so that he may notify the old bell ringer in the tower of Independence Hall and enable him to send the news broadcast through the city by the iron tongue of the old liberty bell.
